item.title: ADM
item.description: score:-45 Chances: Archer-Daniels-Midland Co. has a diverse range of agricultural commodities and segments, which provides potential for growth and stability in the long-term. The company’s focus on nutrition and other end markets such as food, beverages, and feed presents opportunities for expansion and increased revenue.
